name: Eve Wendzicki
text: It’s hard to describe how unappetizing the mini cinnamon rolls are. Pizza was ok... breadsticks were good but the sauce paired with them was weak and runny. Definitely avoid the cinnamon rolls... waste of $6; they’re inedible.
